comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. This contract includes one or more amendments. Consultant to conduct an update of site conditions and supplementary Phase II. III Environmental Site Assessments at the following four locations: - Z19 Chenal Ecarte Range, Walpole Island, Ontario; - Light 92 Light Station, Mariatown, Ontario; - Sherman?s Point Light Station, Lennox & Addington County, Ontario; and, - Whiskey Island, Georgian Bay, Ontario.
